[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Banner” module_class=”torn-edge” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(223,217,191,0.76) 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(223,217,191,0.76)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/porn-the-facts-for-adults-footer-banner.jpg” custom_margin=”||||false|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_color_gradient_stops_phone=”rgba(223,217,191,0.76) 100%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%” background_color_gradient_start_position_phone=”100%” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 0% 20%;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” z_index=”2″ max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_margin=”15vh||15vh||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”8vh||8vh||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0vh||0vh||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||||false|false” module_alignment_tablet=”left” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_margin__hover_enabled=”off|hover”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”opening-header-short” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ header_text_color=”#333333″ header_font_size=”77px” header_font_size_tablet=”70px” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Facts

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”banner-sub-title” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]he korero tika[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_css_before=”width: 200px;||height: 476px;||content: ”;||background-image: url(/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/research-doodle.gif);||position: absolute;||left: -220px;||top: 100px;||background-size: cover;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#4b858e” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#4b858e” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_font=”Zooja Pro|100|||||||” header_3_text_align=”left” header_3_text_color=”#cccdce” header_3_font_size=”63px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-0.1px” header_3_line_height=”0.9em” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”” header_3_font_size_phone=”40px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There’s such different information about porn and young people…

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”30px” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”19px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

on the internet now and if you’re looking for some helpful facts, typing porn into your search bar may not take you to where you intended…

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ text_font=”|300|||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

So, we’ve reviewed the most recent international data using academic research articles and put the findings into two user-friendly facts resources for adults (Porn: The Facts for Adults) and young people (Porn: The Facts for Youth). We’ve also created a reference list of key research on porn and young people and potential impacts of porn on attitudes, beliefs, behaviours and mental health.

This is a growing subject area with new research coming out every year, so we continue to learn and update our content.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text module_class=”col-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“In our digital age, it’s a matter of when not if our kids will see porn – and it’s more important than ever that we’re prepared. This means knowing the facts, knowing how to have the conversations, and understanding porn as it is today. Being naive is no longer an option.”
— Brothers in Arms, Auckland

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row A resource for adults with an overview of the new porn landscape and current research on the potential impacts of porn on young people.

to porn exposure and usage amongst youth and the potential impacts of porn on young people’s attitudes, beliefs, behaviours and mental health. [/dsm_flipbox_child][/dsm_flipbox][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”footer-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F6F3EF” z_index=”2″ custom_margin=”||-15vh||false|false” custom_padding=”80px|80px|80px|80px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|20px|20px|20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-1b27fc3d-7579-4286-975a-244b5a16c6f4%22:%91%93,%22gcid-a394b62d-6ad6-4a00-840a-6f56a4918f0b%22:%91%93}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”1.9em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]Whatever your views on porn, it’s here to stay, and it’s everywhere. To make sure our future generations have happy, healthy sexual relationships it’s essential that we equip them with what they need to know.” [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”14px” text_line_height=”1.4em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

— Richie Hardcore, NZ Social Change Campaigner
